comments: She is such an amazing person. If you think she\'s hot, you should check out her little sister.
She\'s hot and she is very easy. what more can you ask for? Test are easy no excuse for not making an A. Plenty of bonus. fun project at the end of the year

She sucks as a professor lol jk. but she is a extremely smart business woman. take here and she will definitely make you think of ways how you can change your career. the end of the year project it hard but fun. if you are plannin to get a master it will help u out big time
Has Field Experience so its not just text regurgitation. Interactive and Fun class. If you can find one of her classes take it.

Professor DeVivo is an amazing instructor. She is dynamic, charismatic, funny and sharp. She is the most intelligent business woman I have ever met....not to mention is hot!!! She is PERFECT in every way as a professor.

She is the hottest professor in school! She looks like Cameron dias when she smiles! Great sense of humor and great easy class, very entertainig and you learn some hints on negotiating a better salary etc.
